name: Series of clever unjust decisions.
motif: In succession and unintentionally a man causes damage to others. All of them together bring him to the court. In each case the judge makes decisions that are formally logical but patently unacceptable and saves the man.
[paste it here]: m39d. Series of clever unjust decisions. In succession and unintentionally a man causes damage to others. All of them together bring him to the court. In each case the judge makes decisions that are formally logical but patently unacceptable and saves the man.
Mythemes:
•	Man causes damage unintentionally.
	•	People bring man to court.
	•	Judge makes logical but unacceptable decisions.
	•	Man is saved.
